summary: Round 2 verification confirms both MEDIUM issues from Round 1 have been properly fixed. No new quality issues introduced.

issues_verified.title: Stale Doc Reference to PipelineIntegrationService
issues_verified.verification: Grep for PipelineIntegrationService in docs/story-tracking-web-app-architecture.md returns 0 matches. Section now correctly documents StoryCreationService as canonical path.

issues_verified.title: Silent Orphan Fallback Without Error Tracking
issues_verified.verification: ProcessingResult now includes orphan_fallbacks field (line 146). Fallback path increments counter at line 590.

deferred_issues.title: Quality Gate Threshold Not Configurable via Environment
deferred_issues.rationale: Acceptable for MVP, can add environment variable support later if needed

deferred_issues.title: Test Coverage Gap - No EvidenceValidator Mock Tests
deferred_issues.rationale: EVIDENCE_VALIDATOR_AVAILABLE flag provides safe fallback path

deferred_issues.title: Inconsistent Orphan Count Semantics in OrphanIntegrationService Path
deferred_issues.rationale: Current behavior is consistent within path (signature-level counting)

recommendation: Both MEDIUM issues from Round 1 have been properly fixed. No regressions or new issues introduced. PR is ready for merge.
